resources.string: How do you like this app? We would be very happy if you could rate our application on Google Play. Thanks for your support!
You can get more help at any time by choosing \"Help\" from the game\'s menu.\n\nBy choosing \"Share with friends\", you can share your best score and see if somebody can beat it.

string-array.name: meta_description
string-array.item: Join the numbers and get to the cell with 2048!
Just swipe to move the cells in the desired direction.
When two cells with the same number collide, they will merge into one.
2048 is an addictive puzzle game, and it\'s the hardest of them all.
You\'ll win as soon as you\'ve reached the final 2048 cell on the field.
But your score can even go beyond 2048. Merge as many cells as possible!
If the field is blocked and you cannot move cells anymore, you\'ve lost!
The first moves are simple, but will you really get to cell 2048?
2048 is available for all phones and tablets with Android 2.2+.
